data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
In the minute 3, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Toluca.
Diego Montano Robles awards Leon a goal kick.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Ball safe as Leon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Toluca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 7, Diego Montano Robles awards the home team a throw-in.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
In the minute 10, Throw-in Leon.
David Ramirez (Leon) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
In the minute 11, It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
Corner awarded to Leon.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 13, In Toluca a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Pedro Aquino Leon.
Ball safe as Leon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Toluca have a goal kick.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
In the minute 27, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Toluca.
William da Silva (Toluca) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
Throw-in Leon.
Goal! David Ramirez gives Leon a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 31, That's a fine assist from Angel Mena.
William da Silva for Toluca drives towards goal at Estadio Nemesio Diez. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
In the minute 35, Diego Montano Robles awards Leon a goal kick.
Alan Medina is replacing Diego Gonzalez for the home team.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
In the minute 38, Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Michael Estrada.
Alan Medina with an assist there.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 45, Diego Montano Robles awards the away team a throw-in.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Emanuel Gigliotti with Jose Rodriguez.
Free kick in a good position for Leon!
Corner awarded to Leon.
In the minute 49, Toluca have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
Leon push upfield but Diego Montano Robles quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 53, Leon are caught offside.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 56, Free kick Leon.
Luis Montes is booked for the away team.
Throw-in for Toluca in their own half.
Free kick Toluca.
In the minute 59, Toluca make their second substitution with Rubens Sambueza replacing Pablo Lopez.
Carlos Morales (Toluca) is making a third substitution, with Kevin Castaneda replacing Michael Estrada.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Toluca.
In the minute 60, Osvaldo Rodriguez (Leon) gets a yellow card.
Joel Campbell is replacing Fernando Navarro for Leon at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Diego Montano Robles signals a throw-in for Toluca, close to Leon's area.
In the minute 64, In Toluca a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Toluca.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Toluca.
In the minute 69, Alexis Canelo converts the penalty to give Toluca a 2-1 lead.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Toluca.
Goal! Luis Montes equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
In the minute 74, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
Nicolas Sosa is on a sub for Angel Mena for Leon.
In the minute 76, Andres Mosquera is replacing Osvaldo Rodriguez for the away team.
Diego Montano Robles awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
In the minute 80, Toluca have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Toluca apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Haret Ortega. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Leon.
In the minute 82, Joel Campbell for Leon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
Toluca's Kevin Castaneda breaks free at Estadio Nemesio Diez. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 83, Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Free kick Leon.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
In the minute 85, Ball safe as Toluca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Carlos Morales is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Nemesio Diez with Javier Guemez replacing William da Silva.
The home team replace Antonio Rios with Enrique Triverio.
In the minute 86, The away team have replaced Jean Meneses with Juan Ignacio Gonzalez. This is the fifth substitution made today by Marcos Ignacio Ambriz.
Throw-in for Leon in the half of Toluca.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Leon close to the penalty box.
At Estadio Nemesio Diez, Toluca are penalized for being offside.
Corner awarded to Leon.
Can Leon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Toluca's half?
Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Throw-in Toluca.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
